text: Bawani Chali or Bawani Challi () is a neighborhood in the Karachi West district of Karachi, Pakistan. It was previously administered as part of the SITE Town borough,SITE Town - Government of Pakistan which was disbanded in 2011. There are several ethnic groups in Bawani Chali including Punjabis, Sindhis, Kashmiris, Seraikis, Balochis, Memons, Bohras Ismailis, etc., although the population of Bawani Chali is predominantly Pakhtun. == Main areas == * Pathan Colony * Hyder Chali == References == == External links == * Karachi Website. * Local Government Sindh. Category:Neighbourhoods of Karachi Category:SITE Town
title: Bhawani Chali
